TopicTitle: Enter the Squad and Shapeways "Holiday Takeoff" Sweepstakes!

Articles.Content:
The holidays are almost here. It's a time when you take off from your responsibilities and take off for family gatherings (but please don't take off your pants after all those delicious holiday meals). Squad and SHAPEWAYS are also now giving you the chance to take off some funds from the regular price of a 3D print in the "Holiday Takeoff" sweepstakes."

This Friday on our TWITTER page, we're going to ask you a question. Reply back via a tweet with your answer, @kerbalspacep, @shapeways and #KSPShapes and you'll be entered into a random drawing to win one of several Shapeways discount codes. One lucky winner each week will win a featured KSP 3D Print from Shapeways and another lucky winner each week will win a copy of KSP for Steam!

The Shapeways print you'll be playing for this week is the KERBAL MECHANIC. No purchase necessary. We'll see you on Friday. Good luck!

Edited November 17, 2014 by Rowsdower
